messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
I’d love to help—but I need a bit more to go on. Could you tell me your current location or share your latitude and longitude? Once I have that, I can look up what city you’re in.
I don't have any more information. Can you maybe try to figure it out by yourself?

I’m afraid I can’t determine your city without at least some location data. If you can share your current latitude & longitude (or even a nearby street address, landmark, or ZIP/postal code), I can look up which city you’re in. Otherwise, I don’t have enough to go on.
Sorry, I really don't have any more info!

I’m sorry, but without any location data—like coordinates, an IP‐based location, a nearby address, postal code or landmark—I have no way to tell what city you’re in. If you can later share even rough latitude/longitude (or let me know your IP or a nearby street/postal code), I’d be happy to look it up for you.
